li: ETL data processing i.e., SSIS etc.

p.4: Candidate will be responsible for migration from On Prem to GCP, as well as operational support

li: Understand on-prem applications, and dependencies to design for Cloud migration
li.1: Support integration and data teams in integration testing
li.2: Owns the change request process and coordinates with other teams as necessary
li.3: Creating, enhancing and maintaining models to support business requirements
li.4: Provide production support for the ongoing work
